math

Class MathMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • math.MathMethods

  • public class MathMethods
extends Object
    class of basic math methods to help in mathematical problems. Methods such: square root, area of rectangle, circumference of rectangle, power, division
    Version:
    0.1 build 3000 7/16/2017
    Author:
    R}AM#UN>
